tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE guerrilla_marketing_media (
  media_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  media_type VARCHAR(50),
  event_id INT,
  event_date TIMESTAMP,
  image_url VARCHAR(255),
  video_url VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE guerrilla_marketing_images (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id UUID,
    image_url TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE guerrilla_marketing_videos (
    video_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id UUID,
    video_url TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE guerrilla_marketing_events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name TEXT,
    event_date DATE,
    location TEXT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE guerrilla_marketing_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_date DATE,
    event_location VARCHAR(255),
    event_type ENUM('image', 'video'),
    event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE event_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    image_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES guerrilla_marketing_events(event_id)
)

CREATE TABLE event_videos (
    video_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    video_url VARCHAR(255),
    video_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES guerrilla_marketing_events(event_id)
)

CREATE TABLE event_organizers (
    organizer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organizer_name VARCHAR(255),
    organizer_email VARCHAR(255)
)
